mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Has been confined to the house for three months because of bladder and prostate problems; The University of Virginia is well--the students are extremely self-disciplined, resulting in the school being "as quiet as a convent"; the professors are delighted with their situations and the abilities of the students.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1825 August 9, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to [William Short], n.p.
